thread.title: Nick

author: Nick
title: Nick
text: I have placed several orders with Banggood and never had an issue until recently. However, if one believes that the true measure of a company is not how well they do handling routine and uneventful processes, but rather how well they respond to problems, then Banggood is definitely a cut above. I recently needed to contact their customer support about an unordered package that showed up at my door, which apparently had gotten mixed up with an order I did not receive. Their response time was exceptionally fast throughout our correspondence, although their comprehension of English was sometimes lacking and I had to repeat several statements. That aside, their response consistently demonstrated their commitment to resolving my issue and ensuring my satisfaction. I would have no hesitation in recommending Banggood.
